title: How to Find Out Why You Were Suspended on Xbox Live

steps.title: Error messages.
steps.content: Error messages. If your account has been suspended, you may see one of these messages when you sign in to Xbox Live: "Your account has been suspended due to a problem with your payment option." "This console has been banned for violations of the Terms of Use."

steps.title: Verify that the credit card you use for your Xbox account is valid and up-to-date.
steps.content: Verify that the credit card you use for your Xbox account is valid and up-to-date. Your account might have been suspended because of an outstanding balance.

steps.title: Call Xbox Customer Support for an explanation of your suspension and how to get it lifted.
steps.content: Call Xbox Customer Support for an explanation of your suspension and how to get it lifted.

steps.title: Check your inbox for an email from Xbox regarding your suspension.
steps.content: Check your inbox for an email from Xbox regarding your suspension.

steps.title: Visit the Xbox support forums.
steps.content: Visit the Xbox support forums. In the "My LIVE account was suspended" section you can describe your issue and receive a response from an Xbox representative. [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source
